comment.body: @Tkarita: Love the Chaotic Unicode, just a week ago I was helping someone destroy a discord chat. We all had fun.

Looks...Interesting. Also depends on what you're looking to do. I would recommend Ubuntu and just messing around with it more than ElementaryOS (looks like it's lacking quite a bit). There's also CentOS and Debian which are nice to mess around with. 

Or as Alex recommended, to check out the different distros on youtube and see which one you fancy best.
I actually have a C.H.I.P...have yet to unbox it yet though x.x
